title: Hacking Victim

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, a random player will have hacked you and they will know this.
- You do not have access to the factional chat at the start of the game. Zage members know who you are, but not the other way around. Also, Zage members can't have been your hacker.
- When you kill your hacker (or if a zage member kills them), you gain their role's abilities and attributes and join the Zage factional chat.
- If your hacker dies to someone else, their killer becomes the new hacker. If they were hanged, a random voter becomes your hacker.
- **Piercing:** Your attack is one tier higher than your target's current defense (including non-permanent defense), if your target is your hacker.
- **Aura:** Your defense is the same tier as your attacker's current attack value, if your attacker is your hacker.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player by berating them with words, and sending them the most cursed stuff you can find, including [REDACTED]. One night cooldown.
